Name: Activate: 激活
About the game: This is a interesting single-player game. In this game, you need to collect limited props, explore and activate the mysterious cube maze. The game uses a dungeon mechanism. As the activation progresses, you will discover new items, your items will be more powerful, and the blocks will be more tricky. Various types of block and items waiting you to discover! Flexible selection and use of various items can make activation more effective and allow you to go further on the road of activation, while abusing props will only make your props run out faster—— Once you use up all the props, the dungeon activation journey is over! Use many kinds of items to activate the blocks: In order to activate group after group of cubes, you sacrificed... your precious thinking. This is no easy task—— Hey, I know you're very smart! Let's activate it!
